Specialists in strategic & technical AI education.

If you're looking to understand the AI landscape, build AI products, manage AI teams, or engage in technical AI work and research, we have something for you.

Not sure where to start? Let us help.

Start here - Find your pathway!

üèù Dive into a workshop!

We have a two-pronged approach to AI education: technical and strategic. Our workshops are small, which allows the presentation can be specific to the audience, and the session to be highly interactive and targeted.

Technical Deep Learning Workshop

A hands-on deep learning workshop for those looking to use AI in their projects.

Read more

AI For Leadership

Designed for executives, startup founders, government, and leadership teams, looking to understand and adopt AI.

Read more

Create your own!

Collaborate with us to build a workshop focused around your projects, specialised to your team.

Read more

Looking for something else? Let's have a chat! We're always keen to work with good people, and are open to different ideas!

üåà Our Values

"AI has the capability of providing something for everybody, only because, and only when, it is created by everybody.‚Äù ~ Jane Jacobs (She said "cities" instead of "AI", but it's well-expressed!)

Empathy & Ethics

The software we write and algorithms we deploy will affect people. We aim to be aware of potential impacts and create a culture of empathetic ethical engineering.

Community & Diversity

We want to create a positive impact in our local community. We believe that change is best driven locally, upwards.

Empowerment

Skills allow for empowerment and can yield independence. By building technical skills, we hope to enable others to make the kind of change they want to see; change that benefits them and their community.

Happiness

Learning should be fun! We want people to come away from this workshop feeling excited, happy and motivated to implement new systems and processes.

Adaptability

Each group of people comes to the Braneshop with different skills, interests and abilities. We aim to be adaptable to the groups we get, to engage with each individual on a personal level, and present the material in a way that is meaningful, relatable and intuitive.

Technical Excellence

Programming is how we build deep learning networks, and as such we believe it is important to ensure that they way we write and structure the code is of a high quality. We spend a lot of time making sure that we communicate ideas in code through strong coding practices, which ensures that students have a strong foundation on which to build future projects.
